title: Everything Our Editors Are Buying From Week 2 Of Ulta’s 21 Days Of Beauty
description: ICYMI: Ulta's 21 Days of Beauty sale — one of the year’s most highly anticipated shopping events — is back and better than ever. From now till March 27, there will be 50% off flash sales featuring different products every day, ranging from makeup and skincare to hair and beauty tools.But here's the exciting twist: Alongside these daily 24-hour markdowns, the retailer is also introducing Weekly Beauty Steals, giving you an entire week to snag discounts off additional cult favorites. In other words, this is the perfect opportunity to score an excellent discount on everything you've been eyeing for your beauty cabinet, from investment purchases to holy grail restocks.Our team of editors have combed through the entire list to highlight the deals truly worth your attention — and your money. Expect rare discounts on premium hairstyling tools, major savings on signature scents, and exclusive offers from brands like Tarte, Charlotte Tilbury, Olaplex, PMD, and Ole Henriksen. Keep reading for our top picks — and we'll be updating this roundup as more deals become available, so make sure to bookmark this page.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.r.e.m. beauty Essential Drip Glossy BalmDate: Thursday, March 13Ariana Grande really nailed it with this lip balm. It imparts a shiny wash of cherry red while keeping your lips smooth and hydrated, thanks to jojoba seed oil. Pair this with a slightly darker lip liner, and you’ve got yourself this season’s hottest lip combo.r.e.m. beauty Essential Drip Glossy Balm, $, available at UltaKate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating TreatmentDate: Thursday, March 13A longtime beauty editor favorite, this facial treatment is our go-to for minimizing the appearance of enlarged pores and dull skin. It contains AHA, lactic acid, and fruit enzymes, which gently buff away dead skin cells while revealing a brighter and smoother complexion.Kate Somerville ExfoliKate Intensive Exfoliating Treatment, $, available at UltaSacheu Peel Off Liner STAY-N BundleDates: Week of March 14-20Sacheu’s long-lasting, peel-off lip liners took off on TikTok when Billie Eilish used them in a GRWM video. You can now grab the brand’s bestselling mocha and brown shades for 50% off. Best of all, this deal will be available for the entire week. Sacheu Peel Off Liner STAY-N Bundle, $, available at UltaKiehl's Ultra Facial Cream RefillDate: Friday, March 14Squalane and ceramides are both barrier-strengthening ingredients our editors always look for in their skincare products, and this moisturizer has them in spades. With a lightweight texture and 72-hour moisture lock, it leaves your skin feeling softer and looking healthier. Get the jumbo-size refill so you’ll never fear running out. Kiehl's Ultra Facial Cream Refill, $, available at UltaBillie Eilish Eilish No. 2 Eau de ParfumDate: Friday, March 14Billie Eilish’s fragrance brand is seriously underrated if you ask us. This woody floral scent — featuring a calming blend of wet poppy flowers, incense, and palo santo — has been billed as an affordable alternative to Valentino’s Donna Born in Roma by perfume fanatics.Billie Eilish Eilish No. 2 Eau de Parfum, $, available at UltaPMD Personal Microderm Elite ProDate: Wednesday, March 19This at-home device claims to deliver professional-grade microdermabrasion results by buffing away dead skin cells to reveal a glowier complexion. The vacuum suction boosts circulation and collagen production, leaving the skin firmer and allowing skincare products to penetrate deeper. A half-off sale on this investment beauty tool is not one to be missed.PMD Personal Microderm Elite Pro, $, available at UltaOUAI Anti-Frizz Styling CrèmeDate: Saturday, March 15This styling cream tackles frizz and flyaways without weighing the hair down or leaving it greasy. It contains upcycled jackfruit extract, which delivers heat protection alongside a divine scent.Ouai Anti-Frizz Styling Crème, $, available at UltaTarte Maracuja Juicy Lip Plumping GlossDate: Saturday, March 15This lip gloss went viral on TikTok a few years ago for its ability to make the lips appear fuller in seconds, all while imparting an alluring shine. It’s infused with maracuja oil, a vitamin C-rich ingredient that brightens and smoothens the lips. Tarte Maracuja Juicy Lip Plumping Gloss, $, available at UltaAnastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz Precision Eyebrow PencilDate: Sunday, March 16Whether you're going for bold or barely-there, this ultra-fine brow pencil is a winner. The thin, retractable design allows for hairlike strokes that fill in sparse areas with ease and optimal precision. Finish off with a few strokes using the built-in spoolie for a seamless look.Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz Precision Eyebrow Pencil, $, available at UltaFOREO LUNA 4 Go Facial Cleansing & Massaging DeviceDate: Monday, March 17Beauty tools are investment purchases in our book, so it’s worth snapping them up when there is a super rare half-off deal. This nifty device offers a deep cleanse, removing 99% of dirt, oil, and makeup residue in the process.LUNA LUNA 4 Go Facial Cleansing & Massaging Device, $, available at UltaPeter Thomas Roth Instant FIRMx Eye Temporary Eye TightenerDate: Wednesday, March 19This TikTok-viral treatment is your secret weapon when you want to look like you’ve had a good night’s sleep. Featuring a peptides- and silicates-rich formula, it’s a quick fix that works wonders on eliminating puffy under-eye bags, offering a temporary lifting effect that lasts up to 12 hours.Peter Thomas Roth Instant FIRMx Eye Temporary Eye Tightener, $, available at UltaMurad Retinal ReSculpt Overnight TreatmentDate: Friday, March 21If you've struggled with purging as a result of retinol serums in the past, this gentle yet effective treatment featuring encapsulated retinal — a souped-up form of retinoid that is more effective — is a must-try. Its rejuvenating and smoothing benefits are highly rated, and it is rarely on sale. Make the most of it.Murad Retinal ReSculpt Overnight Treatment, $, available at UltaEstée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce CremeDate: Saturday, March 22When it comes to skincare investments, this night cream is worth every cent — especially at 50% off. Hibiscus morning bloom extract and “Botox-like” acetyl hexapeptide-8 help boost the skin’s firmness, while vitamin E and moringa extract protect the skin from things like air pollution. Reviewers rave about the luxurious texture, which transforms from rich to weightless as it melts into the skin.Estée Lauder Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Creme, $, available at UltaPATTERN The 3-in-1 Interchangeable Curling IronDate: Sunday, March 23If you have curly or wavy hair, this could be your new hairstyling MVP. Featuring three thin tourmaline ceramic barrel attachments, this heat styler set lets you create everything from tight ringlets to beachy waves. The eight temperature settings and heat-protectant glove make this even easier to use.Pattern The 3-in-1 Interchangeable Curling Iron, $, available at UltaCharlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Setting SprayDate: Thursday, March 27This lightweight, waterproof mist locks in makeup for up to 16 hours, ensuring no fading or settling into fine lines. Japanese green tea extract hydrates the skin, and aromatic resin blurs pores as though you’re wearing a soft-focus filter. The travel-size version is great for on-the-go touch-ups, and the fact that it will be less than $13 makes this a must-have.Charlotte Tilbury Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray, $, available at UltaLike what you see?
